questions.question: What is the best book you've ever read and why?

answers.answer: Oh, my best book? Well, to be honnest, I don't read at all. I don't know why but I can't spend my time reading books, I fell it like a waste of time... it's not funny because I want to read, the Lovecraft's novels seems to be very good for me, for my imagination maybe. Now I don't know what to write for you, maybe a story?
Once upon a time... no just kidding, i'm a funny guy hu?
Okay, now the eighty words will be complete, or not? So many questions and no answers...
